docs.creator: Of A Revolution
docs.description: O.A.R. (Of a Revolution) July 14, 2007 Red Rocks Amphitheater Morrison, CO Source: AT-PRO24 -> Sony TCD-D8 (stand @ 10 ft) Location: Center Behind Soundboard/Mixer (SBD hookups were not available) Transfer: Sony TCD-D8 -> audacity-> CDWAV-> FLAC Taper: Chuck Sclafani (sclafani@cornerofgrey-street.com) Transferred by: Chuck Sclafani (sclafani@cornerofgrey-street.com) Disc 01: Total: 57.33 01 - Intro 02 - Love and Memories 03 - Hey Girl 04 - Risen 05 - Untitled 06 - Dareh Meyod 07 - Something Coming Over 08 - I Feel Home* 09 - 52-50 10 - The Downeaster 'Alexa'^ Disc 2: Total: 68.13 01 - Lay Down 02 - Patiently 03 - Whose Chariot 04 - Heard The World 05 - Delicate Few 06 - Black Rock (Bongo Intro/Blood Outro) Encore: 07 - Encore Break 08 - See You Cry~ 09 - That Was A Crazy Game of Poker Notes: * Marc and Richard ^ Billy Joel cover ~ Marc solo Throughout the recording, especially from Something Coming Over forward, you will hear drunken teens screaming like wolves. If only they learned to be quiet around tapers this recording would have been much improved. So we can thank them for killing the recording. Enjoy!
docs.source: AT-PRO24 -> Sony TCD-D8 (stand @ 10 ft)
